Class Trader

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Trader
  • public class Trader
extends Entity
    Trader entities at the near the bottom of the screen. They spawn Buy/Sell orders to buy/sell hitcoins. The have an amount of coins and cash. Their net worth changes with the price of the hitcoin. They are represented by their portraits, names and nicknames.

      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)

      void update()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trader

        public Trader​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String nickname,
              java.lang.String initials,
              int coins,
              int cash,
              java.lang.String portrait,
              Vec2 pos)
        Initializes a trader with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the trader
        nickname - Nickname of the trader
        initials - Initials of the trader to be written on the orders of this trader
        coins - Coins that thus trader has
        cash - Cash that this trader has
        portrait - Path to the portrait image
        pos - Position on the screen
